name: smdb-ace
description: An editor that saves / loads an encrypted JSON file from the server which has no access to the decrytion key ### Components #### Server side framework Express / Node #### Authentication [express-session / connect-redis](https://github.com/expressjs/session#compatible-session-stores) #### Embedded JSON editor [Ace](https://ace.c9.io) #### Front end symmetric encryption [crypto-js](https://github.com/brix/crypto-js) ## Installation ### Ace builds     cd ..     git clone https://github.com/ajaxorg/ace-builds.git  #### Express ##### Create a package.json file     [npm init -y](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/v6/commands/npm-init) #### Code formatter ### Development tools #### Local markdown file viewer ##### Firefox [Markdown Viewer Webext](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/markdown-viewer-webext)
